fields.description:
Description:
While testing the new builder.py script I packaged some applications. None of theses or any other packaged Titanium application (run over multiple SDKs) shows any icons.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install xcode 4.3 over 4.2
2) Package an app for distribution
3) check the Xcode organizer for the app icon

Result:
No icons are shown

Expected:
Icons displayed
fields.summary: iOS: Xcode 4.3 - No icons appear in Xcode organizer for packaged Titanium apps

comments.body:
Tested and cannot Reproduce.

Followed the same process as explained in the ticket. The a 57x57 icon showsup on the xcode organiser for the archived app. 

Holding off on closing the bug so that i can retest with a clean install of Xcode 4.3 with no 4.2 and if anybody else on the team can confirm it by installing an Xcode 4.3 on top of xcode 4.2 and packaging the app.
Unable to reproduce this on either machine that exhibited the behavior even earlier today. Closing as cannot reproduce. Will monitor for this issue.
